  physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water on the right hand side and a field with trees on the left hand side and the foreground of the photograph. A ladder descending into the water can be seen
 and numerous sampans are stationed around it. There are people who are standing around and leaning on the ladder as well. A row of rickshaws are parked at the left hand side of the photograph.
